metadata.synopsis: Banter between SH and Gale (not Wyll)

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Why must the Dead Three be so obvious and ugly with their decor? Blood and bones. Bones and blood. Pointy nonsense. Now Lady Shar - she has panache.
0.context: NodeContext: bemoaning the aesthetics of a triumverate of evil gods. 'At least Shar had some panache.' = SH left Shar. 'Now Lady Shar - she has panache.' = SH loyal to shar

3.speaker: Gale
3.text: As did Mystra's home on Elysium. Her ribbed vaults and buttresses created a magic entirely of their own. Not to mention her pleasure domes...
3.context: NodeContext: Enthusiastic in remembering the architecture of Mystra's home, ignorant of the innuendo

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.context: NodeContext: Snort of laughter, Induging in juvenile humour briefly. Applicable to either SH arc

2.speaker: Gale
2.text: It's a perfectly legitimate architectural feature!
